Hi Dan and David,

Confirming we have update the site. 
Price increase only applies to new created quotes starting Mar 28 onwards. 
- If initial rental is under 4500 +2%
- If initial rental is above 4500 +9%
Previous quote will not be affected, it will still have the previous price increase 

Word document generator has been added to the site as well. Let me know if this works for you?

Sorry I thought it was live already? Yes please make it live Joel.

Cheers
Dan

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath

I would like to sneak another increase through with our background pricing please. Of the same sort David has done throughout last year. Same rules apply - I believe it doesn't affect quotes below $4500 (or some similar value) whereas it is applied to any quote above this amount.

I would like to add a further 3% please?

Thank you

Dan


Dan Gerber
Managing Director
Advantage Property Styling
